name: Rogue Drone
description:
Fight

Blast your way through the armies of Drones, leaving carnage in your way as you fight your war through the DroneTech complex.

Each facility you clear DroneTech will become more and more aggressive in trying to stop you and your advanced prototype escaping, sending more and tougher drones.

Customization

Your drones appearance is completely in your hands and customizable with 50 paint jobs ranging from basic colors, patterns and national flags to choose from, as well as a number of stickers, sticker colors, eye and neon underglow options to choose from.
